about_the_game:
FG Medieval Machines Map Pack

The Medieval Machines Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package allows the creation of medieval-style machines and the inner workings of mills and other axel-powered devices with over 150 images.

This pack includes the following items:

  • Brushes include muddy road, stone, and four types of timbers
  • Decorations include carts, barrels and containers, push brooms, large gears, axels, and many other machine parts, as well as frames and base construction elements
  • Floors include old boards and wood floors of different shapes
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough
detailed_description:
FG Medieval Machines Map Pack

The Medieval Machines Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package allows the creation of medieval-style machines and the inner workings of mills and other axel-powered devices with over 150 images.

This pack includes the following items:

  • Brushes include muddy road, stone, and four types of timbers
  • Decorations include carts, barrels and containers, push brooms, large gears, axels, and many other machine parts, as well as frames and base construction elements
  • Floors include old boards and wood floors of different shapes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
